Minutes of Talks on Cooperation Inked between DPRK and China
articles.content:
Minutes of Talks on Cooperation Inked between DPRK and China 
    Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The minutes of the talks on cooperation in oceanic science and technology were signed here Monday between the delegations of the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK and the State Oceanic Administration of China.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were the members of the delegation led by Ho Chang Suk, vice-director of the service, and from the Chinese side the members of the delegation headed by Zhou Maoping, deputy director of the State Oceanic Administration of China, and a staff member of the Chinese embassy here.

Friendly Meeting with Members of Nigerian Delegation Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Members of Nigerian Delegation Held
    Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with members of the women's delegation of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria was held on Monday.
 Present on invitation were the members of the women's delegation of the party headed by National Woman Leader of the Party Josephine Anenih and a staff member of the Nigerian embassy here.    
 Present there were Ri Yong Hui, vice-chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union and officials concerned. 
 The representatives of the two women's organizations informed each other of their activities and successes and experience gained by them, deepening the friendship.

articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
    Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A government cultural delegation of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia led by Mahamoda Ahmed Gaas, vice-minister of Youth, Sports and Culture, arrived here on Tuesday.
 Also arriving here today were Mounir Bouchenaki, assistant director-general of the UNESCO, and his party, a delegation of Beijing University of China led by its Party Secretary Min Weifang and a youth delegation of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria headed by its National Youth Leader Bibi Farouk.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Pays Courtesy Call on Hu Jintao
Kim Yong Nam Meets Wen Jiabao
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Wen Jiabao
    Beijing, October 19 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on an official goodwill visit to China met Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council of the PRC, in Zhongnanhai of Beijing on Tuesday.
 A friendly talk took place at the meeting.
